actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that the unemployment benefits of railroad workers will not be reduced by amounts received as military retirement benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to stipulate that unemployment benefits for railroad workers shall not be reduced by amounts received as military retirement benefits by such individuals.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the unemployment benefits of railroad workers will not be reduced by amounts received as military retirement benefits.
